g.text: . The color coordinate results showed that the sample luminescence can be regulated in the green to
red region. Starting from natural materials, a new type of luminescent material is synthesized, which is a feasible
All powder samples of natural sodium feldspar NaAlSi
(3, 5, 7, 9, 11) were synthesized by a high-temperature solid-state method. Natural sodium
(99.9%) were well ground in an agate mortar and then shifted to an alumina crucible. After
being sintered at 1150 °C for 3 h. All mixtures were collected after natural cooling to room temperature, and pul-
. PL spectra were measured at room temperature
using a fluorescent spectrophotometer (FL980, Edinburgh, England) equipped with a 450 W Xe light source. The
amount of phosphor powder was controlled to be 1.5 g.
The fluorescence lifetime of the samples was measured by aFLS920 steady-state and transient-state
The surface morphology and the energy-dispersed X-ray spectroscopy (EDS) meas-
urements were performed using a high-resolution field emission scanning electron microscope (FEI, Nova Nano
The absorption spectrum of the sample was measured by the Hitachi U-3900/3900H spec-
trophotometer and the measurement range was 200–500 nm.
The crystal structures of all the powders were characterized by X-ray powder
0.15406 nm) radiation at 40 kV and 30 mA at room
temperature. The detector covers an angular range 10°
105° with a counting time of 5 s per step.
The color coordinates of the samples were calculated by the CIE software.
1. Jin Sh, X. Z. G. & Zhou, W. H. Synthesis and Optical Properties of Ca
2. Jaek, I., Hütt, G. & Vasilchenko, E. Luminescence and microstructure of Ga, In and Tl centres in laboratory-doped natural feldspars.
3. Ademola, J. A. Natural Science Luminescence Characteristics of Feldspar from Nigeria.
4. Poolton, N. R. J., Mauz, B., Lang, A. Optical excitation processes in the near band-edge region of KAlSi
5. Hairegu, T., Tushagu, A. & Meihereguli, M. Luminescent Properties of Sm
6. Ying, M., Lan, Y. & Zhang, J. H. Research on Mineral Components of Albite Jade Base on Advanced Technology.
7. Wang, D., Lv, S. & Meng, C. Preparation and Luminescent Properties of CaMoOd: Eu
The CIE chromaticity coordinates for NaAlSi
